title: Unexpected error on login
body: been trying to login now for the past 3 hours and have been getting this "An unexpected error has occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support" well I tryed again and again and again with no luck. any solution?

replies.body: Hmmmm this might be something where the client has some damaged files lying around and can't quite get you logged in because of it. Try running a quick repair through the client options, and let me know if that does the trick.
I ran a full repair in the options and still cant log in

Join the club of people who cant even login to the game ur not alone to bad riot ignores us for 2 months now while we cant even login to the game ive posted so much about this and i never get an answer so your pretty much screwed. dont ask riot about it they dont care. Also dont waste time on reinstalling or running the full repair ive tried that many times and it doesnt do shit. ive posted so much about this and i got no answers ever.
